text: Tuscola is an unincorporated community in Leake County, in the U.S. state of Mississippi. ==History== A post office was established at Tuscola in 1872, and remained in operation until 1924. The community derives its name from the first three syllables of Tuscolameta Creek, which flows near the site. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Leake County, Mississippi
title: Tuscola, Mississippi
